description: Resamples the FreeSurfer automatic subcortical segmentation (aseg) to the FEAT functional space.

feat.title: FEAT directory
feat.description: FEAT output directory. Multiple --feat arguments can be supplied.

featdirfile.title: FEAT directory file
featdirfile.description: File with a list of FEAT directories. Can be used in conjunction with --feat.

seg.title: Segmentation volume
seg.description: Change segmentation volume, default is aseg.

svstats.title: Save stats flag
svstats.description: Save result in featdir/stats instead of featdir/reg/freesurfer

standard.title: Standard space flag
standard.description: Map results to standard space instead of native functional space. Implies --svstats.
